103.title: Punishment for murder
103.description: Whoever commits murder shall be punished with death or imprisonment for life, and shall also be liable to fine.
103.punishment: Death or Imprisonment for Life + Fine

101.title: Murder
101.description: Definition of murder (formerly Section 300 IPC). Key distinctions between culpable homicide and murder maintained.

105.title: Punishment for culpable homicide not amounting to murder
105.description: Punishment for culpable homicide not amounting to murder.
105.offense: Culpable homicide not amounting to murder
105.punishment: Life or up to 10 years + Fine

106.title: Causing death by negligence
106.description: Causing death by doing any rash or negligent act not amounting to culpable homicide.
106.punishment: Up to 5 years (up from 2 in IPC 304A) + Fine

63.title: Punishment for rape
63.punishment: Min 10 years, up to Life + Fine

64.title: Punishment for rape
64.description: Stringent punishment capability for rape cases.

69.title: Sexual intercourse by employing deceitful means
69.description: Includes promise to marry false identity etc. New specific provision.

303.title: Theft
303.description: Definition and punishment for theft combined.
303.punishment: Up to 3 years or Fine or Both

308.title: Extortion
308.punishment: Up to 3 years or Fine or Both

309.title: Robbery
309.punishment: Up to 10 years (14 if on highway at night) + Fine

310.title: Dacoity
310.punishment: Life or up to 10 years + Fine

316.title: Criminal breach of trust
316.description: Definition and punishment for criminal breach of trust.
316.punishment: Up to 5 years (up from 3 in IPC 406) + Fine

318.title: Cheating
318.punishment: Up to 3 years (simple) or 7 years (inducing delivery) + Fine

111.title: Organised crime
111.description: New offense defining and punishing organized crime, syndicates, etc.
111.punishment: Death or Life (if death caused) / Min 5 years (others)

113.title: Terrorist act
113.description: New offense defining and punishing terrorist acts within general penal code.

356.title: Defamation
356.punishment: Simple Imprisonment up to 2 years or Fine or Both (Community Service added)

351.title: Criminal intimidation
351.punishment: Up to 2 years or Fine or Both
